W. C. WHITE: THE QUESTION WITH US IS, SHALL WE WAIT ANOTHER PERIOD OF TIME FOR THINGS TO EVOLVE DOWN THERE, OR HAS THE TIME COME FOR THE GENERAL CONFERENCE AND THE SOUTHERN UNION CONFERENCE MEN TO GET TOGETHER AND IN PRAYERFUL, THOUGHTFUL COUNSEL READJUST THOSE MATTERS, AND PUT THE BEST MAN THAT THEY CAN FIND IN CHARGE OF THE PRINTING HOUSE, AND PUT THINGS ON AN ACTUAL PAYING BASIS, AND PLACE UPON THE UNION CONFERENCE THE BURDEN THAT BELONGS TO THE UNION CONFERENCE, AND PLACE UPON INDIVIDUALS THE BURDEN THAT BELONGS TO INDIVIDUALS, AND BRING THE 


                                   -270- 

BUSINESS WHERE IT WILL NOT CONTINUALLY BE GOING INTO DEBT? HAS THE TIME COME FOR THIS ACTION?
